problem_summary_simple: Interleave the first half of an array with the second half.
problem_summary_technical: Uses in-place modification with bit manipulation to store two values in one array element, then extracts them.
key_insights: The core idea is to encode the original and new values within the same array element using bitwise operations.
The `index` helper function correctly maps the original position to the target interleaved position.
This in-place approach is memory-efficient but can be less intuitive than using an auxiliary array.
